topics.topic_html:
Css syntax list



  
  
  
  
Syntax.css



/* Selectors */
element { /* Type Selector */ }
.classname { /* Class Selector */ }
#idname { /* ID Selector */ }
* { /* Universal Selector */ }
[attribute] { /* Attribute Selector */ }
[attribute=value] { /* Attribute Selector with value */ }
[attribute^=value] { /* Attribute Selector starts with value */ }
[attribute$=value] { /* Attribute Selector ends with value */ }
[attribute*=value] { /* Attribute Selector contains value */ }
element:pseudo-class { /* Pseudo-class Selector */ }
element::pseudo-element { /* Pseudo-element Selector */ }
ancestor descendant { /* Descendant Combinator */ }
parent > child { /* Child Combinator */ }
element1 + element2 { /* Adjacent Sibling Combinator */ }
element1 ~ element2 { /* General Sibling Combinator */ }

/* Text Properties */
color: value;
font-family: value;
font-size: value;
font-weight: value;
font-style: value;
text-align: value;
text-decoration: value;
text-transform: value;
line-height: value;
letter-spacing: value;
word-spacing: value;

/* Box Model */
width: value;
height: value;
margin: value;
padding: value;
border: value;
border-radius: value;
box-shadow: value;
outline: value;

/* Background */
background: value;
background-color: value;
background-image: value;
background-repeat: value;
background-position: value;
background-size: value;
background-attachment: value;

/* Positioning */
position: value;
top: value;
right: value;
bottom: value;
left: value;
z-index: value;

/* Flexbox */
display: flex;
flex-direction: value;
flex-wrap: value;
justify-content: value;
align-items: value;
align-content: value;
flex-grow: value;
flex-shrink: value;
flex-basis: value;
order: value;

/* Grid */
display: grid;
grid-template-columns: value;
grid-template-rows: value;
grid-template-areas: value;
grid-gap: value;
grid-column: value;
grid-row: value;
justify-items: value;
align-items: value;
justify-content: value;
align-content: value;

/* Table */
table-layout: value;
border-collapse: value;
border-spacing: value;
caption-side: value;
empty-cells: value;

/* Animation */
animation: value;
animation-name: value;
animation-duration: value;
animation-timing-function: value;
animation-delay: value;
animation-iteration-count: value;
animation-direction: value;
animation-fill-mode: value;
animation-play-state: value;

/* Transition */
transition: value;
transition-property: value;
transition-duration: value;
transition-timing-function: value;
transition-delay: value;

/* Transform */
transform: value;
transform-origin: value;
transform-style: value;

/* Others */
opacity: value;
visibility: value;
overflow: value;
cursor: value;
clip: value;
filter: value;
resize: value;
object-fit: value;
object-position: value;

/* CSS Functions */
calc(value);
var(--variable);
rgb(value, value, value);
rgba(value, value, value, value);
hsl(value, value%, value%);
hsla(value, value%, value%, value);
url('path/to/image');
linear-gradient(direction, color-stop1, color-stop2, ...);
radial-gradient(shape size at position, start-color, ...);
conic-gradient(from angle at position, color1, ...);

/* Media Queries */
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  /* CSS rules */
}
@media (min-width: 600px) {
  /* CSS rules */
}

/* At-rules */
@import url('styles.css');
@font-face {
  font-family: 'MyFont';
  src: url('myfont.woff2');
}
@keyframes animationName {
  from { /* initial state */ }
  to { /* final state */ }
}
@supports (display: grid) {
  /* CSS rules */
}
@page {
  /* CSS rules for printing */
}
@namespace url(namespaceURL);
